channel.title: CVE Feed for Vtiger -- Vtiger CRM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vtiger -- Vtiger CRM

item.title: CVE-2015-6000|2024-08-06T07:06:35.224Z -- vtiger -- vtiger%20crm
item.description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the Settings_Vtiger_CompanyDetailsSave_Action class in modules/Settings/Vtiger/actions/CompanyDetailsSave.php in Vtiger CRM 6.3.0 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension, then accessing it via a direct request to the file in test/logo/.
